title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
When modifying parameters in the 'Modify Parameters' dialog, the following issues were identified:
1. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page.
2. The first and second column could be merged.
OB:
1. There is a large marking between the button and the list. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog.
2. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic.
3. Multiple selection should be allowed as 'Move Up'/'Move Down' action can be applied on more than one item.
4. The signature preview should be a label that wraps text.
5. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover effect.
EB:
1. Reduce the space between the button and list, align the top button with the top of the dialog.
2. Add a label to the table to support mnemonic input.
3. Enable multiple selection in the table.
4. Make the signature preview a label with text wrapping.
5. Set the background color of the signature preview to match the hover effect color.
